page.title: 12CLUBS
page.content: THERE ARE A LOT OF CLUBS IN THE BOTTOM HALF OF OUR BLOCK WHERE THE FACTORIES ARE.MOST OF THEM ARE SPORTS AND SOCIAL CLUBS OWNED BY THE FACTORIES.MOST OF THE ACTIVITIES ARE FOR ADULTS BUT SOME ALSO RUN SMALL CLUBS FOR CHILDRENS SPORTS. SOME OF THE CHURCHES ALSO RUN SMALL CLUBS FOR CHILDREN,OLD-AGED PENSIONERS AND MOTHERS. SOME OF THE CLUBS HAVE THEIR OWN SPORTS GROUNDS WHICH ARE USED FOR FOOTBALL OR CRICKET.OTHER CLUBS HAVE TENNIS AND THERE ARE SEVERAL BOWLING GREENS. THERE IS ONE BRITISH LEGION IN PYPE HAYES.THIS IS A SOCIAL CLUB BUT IT ALSO HAS ITS OWN BOWLING GREEN. THERE ARE NO NIGHT CLUBS IN OUR BLOCK. SCHOOLS ALSO RUN THEIR OWN LITTLE CLUBS FOR CHILDREN SUCH AS SPORTS AND GAMES.
